testCases.query: We want to upgrade from Claude Sonnet 4 to Opus 4.6 across our team. Assess our readiness.
expectedBehavior: Claude runs the 6-phase assessment workflow starting with scope definition
Phase 1 detects current model references in agent files and configuration
Phase 2 researches Opus 4.6 capabilities and breaking changes via WebSearch
Phase 3 scans codebase for patterns affected by the model change (agent model: fields, context window assumptions)
Phase 4 produces a 0-10 readiness score across 6 dimensions
Phase 5 generates prioritized recommendations with effort estimates

testCases.query: We're on OrchestKit 5.x and want to go to 7.x. What will break? Give me the assessment in JSON format.
expectedBehavior: Claude scopes to OrchestKit-only upgrade assessment
Focuses on manifest schema changes, skill/agent renames or removals, and hook migration
Reads CHANGELOG.md to identify breaking changes between versions
Outputs structured JSON report with --json format including readiness score and action items

testCases.query: Refactor the checkout flow to use the strategy pattern instead of if/else chains
expectedBehavior: Claude does NOT invoke the upgrade-assessment skill
Performs a standard code refactoring using design patterns
Uses code editing tools without running platform compatibility checks
